verses.name: Luke 24:29
verses.text: But they constrained him, saying, Abide with us: for it is toward evening, and the day is far spent. And he went in to tarry with them.

verses.name: Luke 24:30
verses.text: And it came to pass, as he sat at meat with them, he took bread, and blessed it, and brake, and gave to them.

verses.name: Luke 24:31
verses.text: And their eyes were opened, and they knew him; and he vanished out of their sight.

verses.name: Luke 24:32
verses.text: And they said one to another, Did not our heart burn within us, while he talked with us by the way, and while he opened to us the scriptures?
